name: klqdraws
introduction: Hi! I'm KLQ and I draw a lotta stuff I enjoy!

name: Overcast
introduction: I'm Andrew Dunne, a 3rd year Computer Science major at UCSC. Some of my interests/hobbies include: computer graphics, tech art, games, environmentalism, and animation. Outside of work, I enjoy creating pixel art and 3D renders: often of food, nature, fan art, or whatever seems interesting. If you're an artist too, show me your art through discord!

name: PotatoDog1
introduction: My name is Gillian, and I am currently a fourth year Art major and Art & Design: Games + Playable Media major undergraduate at UCSC. I love making art and trying out new art techniques! As a fun fact, I've dabbled in 2D frame-by-frame, 2D rigged animation, 3D modeling, and 3D animation (although I'm not skilled in any of these things :X ). Other than making art, I like to read trashy romance novels, eat good food, work on my Stardew Valley farm, and sleep.

name: grifbot
introduction: Hi I'm grifbot! I'm a UCSC and GDA alumni who loves to draw video games, anime, dnd, Vocaloid, and other random nerdy stuff. I've tabled at past SlugCons but it will be my first time returning in person since 2019.  It would mean a lot if you came by and checked out my work!!!

name: silmist
introduction: Hi!! I'm Annie, a 3rd year AGPM major furiously practicing every type of visual art I can get my little hands on. I also do music! I've been making games for a few years now, and have also been upping my various skills in making vocal synth covers. SynthV and Vocaloid own my whole soul.

name: stargyaru
introduction: Hi! I'm annalivia martin-straw (known elsewhere as stargyaru). I'm an art major here at UCSC and a frequent collaborator with GDA. I love making art and games about girls, computers, and girls on the computer. Nice to meet you!

name: NYG002
introduction: Hello! I am NYG and I draw! I am a fan artist for genshin impact. I make both art and merch as well. I hope to create more in the future.

name: Adam Aviles
introduction: HI! My name is Adam Aviles, a first-year Filipino here at UCSC. I'm majoring in Art: Game Design because it's something that piques two of my main interests, technology and art. I really enjoy drawing, whether that be from photo edits to comic strips, and I want to continue to develop my style. I think I started teaching myself how to draw when I was in 6th grade because of the unholy gaming trends at the time, and it just stuck to me, I guess. I have a lot of art I haven't publicized, so I'm excited to participate in this showcase!

name: midimayo
introduction: Aloha I'm Midi! I'm an illustrator, comic artist and merch designer! I'm also an impish angel Vstreamer! I love bright colors and upbeat music!

name: Yaboi_Anther
introduction: Hello, name's Arthur I'm just hear to cry, eat snacks, and draw. Currently doing Arknights and Genshin fanart.

name: Sam Inverts
introduction: Sam Inverts loves anime and video games, and gets way too excited about them! When not drawing silly meme art, they can be found working on comics and illustrations specifically designed to elicit a reaction of, "First of all, how dare you."

name: fxt soba
introduction: Hi! My name is Grace (she/her). I enjoy playing Genshin all day and cosplaying, and sometimes trying to art while having zero clue what I'm doing. I like making stickers and things, please consider checking out my stuff! I'm into manga, anime, lots of nerdy things, the whole shebang. I hope we get to meet someday in person, but for now virtual SlugCon will have to do!

name: anniyell
introduction: hi!! my name is anael (she/they), and i am a filipino american digital artist, designer, and enjoyer of many many things, including art! i hope you enjoy them as well because it is all i have to offer. i specialize in drawing people, characters, portraits, and my dogs the most!

name: bluemew0
introduction: Hi, I’m Ashley and I’m a third year AGPM artist! I often draw fanart of games and anime and I like making my art shiny and pretty!

name: NekoNyancakes
introduction: Art is cool yo.  I am capable of drawing things other than Abigail Williams but choose not to.  Please commission me to fuel my bugman robot addiction.

name: kohaikuun
introduction: Hi! My name is Issy. I use she/her pronouns and I am a 2nd year art major. I love creating art of my own characters as well as making fanart for various games and shows.

name: Yahuri
introduction: im buny 🐇

name: captainedgeart
introduction: Hello everyone! My name is Vika, and I'm a game art major at UCSC! I am a traditional, and digital artist that strives to learn any way I can portray my visions to other people, and have strived to evolve my work in the last five years. Whether it be 2D, 3D, or in a video format, telling stories through my art is what brings me the most excitement in life. The work I'm featuring this year is from a personal project I'm currently working on named "Timeline Zero". If you would like to read more, visit my website linked below. I'm looking forward to seeing all of the amazing art that is going to be featured, and meeting fellow artists!

name: CatieYupThatsMe
introduction: Hi! I’m Catie, I’m a 2D artist currently working on characters and environmental design. My goal is to get into animation, character design, or illustration, and hope to get into an art based career after college.

name: Nyx Aurelia
introduction: Hello, I'm a digital artist who loves to paint from fantasy, anime, and games. Currently I'm working on my passion project "Iteration", a medieval-cosmic universe of my original characters, and my dream is to build a freelance art career for myself so that I can continue this creation! Also I'm a student at UCLA, though I've taken a break to focus on my art for a series of complex reasons QAQ. But welcome, and enjoy!

name: ∑sion
introduction:
Simply vibing. Art's pretty cool but what is will power :') 
 Alumni graduated from UCSC in 2021.

name: Soyemilky
introduction: hii I draw cute anime girls and stuff :)

name: mei_draws
introduction: Heya! My name is Mei, I am a first-year student at UCSC majoring in Art & Design: Games and playable media. I started digital art a few years ago and I am still trying to improve currently. I am interested in drawing anime characters and video game characters such as Genshin Impact. I prefer drawing portraits and faces! I also started to make some merch recently, I hope you guys can go check them out!

name: DK
introduction: I mostly draw OCs, and rarely any fanart. I'm a STEM major, and I LOVE LEAGUE!!! (but I'm not very good at either).

name: Minoumao
introduction: Have you ever wanted to experience the crippling stress from being both in Art and Computer Science? Well this lad has you covered. Fueled by the latest in radioactive waste, this artist makes character designs, storyboards, and illustrations with focus on TV and Animations. Doing art on Photoshop, Sketchbook Pro, and the back of any homework and test, you can experience the effects of never having sleep.

name: fieryphoenix
introduction: Hi! I'm Fieryphoenix, and I draw a little bit, rn I am trying to improve...?

name: Lee
introduction: Hey I'm Lee! I use he/him pronouns and I'm a 3rd year AGPM major filipino artist! I like drawing original characters the most, but will draw the occasional fanart of media I am currently into. I like making stories, fantasizing about making animatics, and trying new things in my art!
